item.title: [sld] Sliver Legion
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Sliver

All Sliver creatures get +1/+1 for each other Sliver on the battlefield.

item.title: [sld] Sliver Legion
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Sliver

All Sliver creatures get +1/+1 for each other Sliver on the battlefield.

item.title: [sld] Lathliss, Dragon Queen
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dragon

Flying

Whenever another nontoken Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.

{1}{R}: Dragons you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [sld] Lathliss, Dragon Queen
item.description:

Flying

Whenever another nontoken Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.

{1}{R}: Dragons you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

item.description:
Creature — Bird

Flying

item.description:

item.title: [j22] Ardoz, Cobbler of Wars
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Goblin Shaman

Haste

Whenever Ardoz, Cobbler of Wars or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

{3}{R}: Create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with haste. Activate only as sorcery.

item.title: [j22] Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Goblin Shaman

Haste

{T}: Create a token that's a copy of target nonlegendary creature you control, except it has haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [j22] Coldsteel Heart
item.description:
Snow Artifact

Coldsteel Heart enters the battlefield tapped.

As Coldsteel Heart enters the battlefield, choose a color.

{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

item.title: [j22] Isu the Abominable
item.description:
Legendary Snow Creature — Yeti

You may look at the top card of your library any time.

You may play snow lands and cast snow spells from the top of your library.

Whenever another snow permanent enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {G}, {W}, or {U}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Isu the Abominable.

item.title: [sld] Wastes
item.description:

{T}: Add {C}.

item.title: [sld] Bolas's Citadel
item.description:
Legendary Artifact

You may look at the top card of your library any time.

You may play lands and cast spells from the top of your library. If you cast a spell this way, pay life equal to its mana value rather than pay its mana cost.

{T}, Sacrifice ten nonland permanents: Each opponent loses 10 life.

item.title: [sld] Leshrac's Sigil
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever an opponent casts a green spell, you may pay {B}{B}. If you do, look at that player's hand and choose a card from it. The player discards that card.

{B}{B}: Return Leshrac's Sigil to its owner's hand.

item.title: [sld] Jet Medallion
item.description:
Artifact

Black spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

item.title: [sld] Merciless Executioner
item.description:
Creature — Orc Warrior

When Merciless Executioner enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.

item.title: [sld] Aggravated Assault
item.description:
Enchantment

{3}{R}{R}: Untap all creatures you control. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Activate only as a sorcery.

item.title: [sld] Zurgo Helmsmasher
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Orc Warrior

Haste

Zurgo Helmsmasher attacks each combat if able.

Zurgo Helmsmasher has indestructible as long as it's your turn.

Whenever a creature dealt damage by Zurgo Helmsmasher this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Zurgo Helmsmasher.

item.title: [sld] Krenko, Tin Street Kingpin
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Goblin

Whenever Krenko, Tin Street Kingpin attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it, then create a number of 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens equal to Krenko's power.

item.title: [sld] Skysovereign, Consul Flagship
item.description:
Legendary Artifact — Vehicle

Flying

Whenever Skysovereign, Consul Flagship enters the battlefield or attacks, it deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.

Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

item.title: [sld] Blind Obedience
item.description:
Enchantment

Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

Artifacts and creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

item.title: [sld] Danitha Capashen, Paragon
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Knight

First strike, vigilance, lifelink

Aura and Equipment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

item.title: [sld] Najeela, the Blade-Blossom
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warrior

Whenever a Warrior attacks, you may have its controller create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token that's tapped and attacking.

{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Untap all attacking creatures. They gain trample, lifelink, and haste until end of turn. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase. Activate only during combat.

item.title: [sld] Scourge of the Throne
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

Whenever Scourge of the Throne attacks for the first time each turn, if it's attacking the player with the most life or tied for most life, untap all attacking creatures. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

item.title: [sld] Loxodon Warhammer
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and has trample and lifelink.

Equip {3}

item.title: [sld] Approach of the Second Sun
item.description:
Sorcery

If this spell was cast from your hand and you've cast another spell named Approach of the Second Sun this game, you win the game. Otherwise, put Approach of the Second Sun into its owner's library seventh from the top and you gain 7 life.

item.title: [sld] Rewind
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell. Untap up to four lands.

item.title: [sld] Bone Splinters
item.description:
Sorcery

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.

Destroy target creature.

item.title: [sld] Fling
item.description:
Instant

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.

Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.

item.title: [sld] Defense of the Heart
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls three or more creatures, sacrifice Defense of the Heart, search your library for up to two creature cards, put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

item.title: [sld] Fellwar Stone
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

item.title: [sld] Reflector Mage
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

When Reflector Mage enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand. That creature's owner can't cast spells with the same name as that creature until your next turn.

item.title: [sld] Carrion Feeder
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

Carrion Feeder can't block.

Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Carrion Feeder.

item.title: [sld] Plaguecrafter
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

When Plaguecrafter enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. Each player who can't discards a card.

item.title: [sld] Doomsday
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library and graveyard for five cards and exile the rest. Put the chosen cards on top of your library in any order. You lose half your life, rounded up.

item.title: [sld] Thoughtseize
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.

item.description:

Carrion Feeder can't block.

Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Carrion Feeder.

item.description:

When Plaguecrafter enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. Each player who can't discards a card.

item.description:

Search your library and graveyard for five cards and exile the rest. Put the chosen cards on top of your library in any order. You lose half your life, rounded up.

item.description:
Sorcery

Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.

item.title: [sld] Imprisoned in the Moon
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature, land, or planeswalker

Enchanted permanent is a colorless land with "{T}: Add {C}" and loses all other card types and abilities.

item.title: [sld] Stasis
item.description:
Enchantment

Players skip their untap steps.

At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Stasis unless you pay {U}.

item.title: [sld] Wheel of Sun and Moon
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant player

If a card would be put into enchanted player's graveyard from anywhere, instead that card is revealed and put on the bottom of that player's library.

item.title: [sld] Prismatic Omen
item.description:
Enchantment

Lands you control are every basic land type in addition to their other types.
